testcase.classname: This feature file has validations related to login page like
testcase.name: User checks if he is able to provide email id to login
testcase.system-out: When Login page URL is launched in the browser..............................passed And User enters invalid email ID in the Email address field.................passed And User enters password in the Password field..............................passed And User clicks Login button on the Login page..............................passed Then user checks if the system throws error.................................passed
